sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCOPOLIA, in botany: A genus of the octandria order, belonging to the gynandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 11th claſs, Sarmentaceoe. The calyx is diphyllous; the corolla quadrifid; the antherae coaleſce in two columns, one placed above the other. Of this there is only one ſpecies, viz. the Compoſita.
